name: War Robots
description: War Robots is an online third-person 6v6 PvP shooter—we’re talking dozens of combat robots, hundreds of weapons combinations, and heated clan battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
